response.original_title: Enrique Iglesias: Live from Odyssey Arena, in Belfast UK
response.overview: He is the 'son of', but Enrique Iglesias doesn't really need that reference anymore. At the same time as Ricky Martin, Enrique turned out to be a successful artist in the Latin and Pop genres. This DVD contains the recording of a concert held in the year 2007 at the Odyssey Arena in Belfast. That was in the period of his English-language album Insomniac. He sings a lot of songs from this album, such as Ring My Bells, Push and Do You Know (The Ping Pong song) and he alternates these with some older Spanish songs such as Bailamos and La Chica de Ayer. The singer with bedroom eyes and ditto voice likes to make contact with the enthusiastic singing along audience and even invites a few people onto the stage, such as with the atmospheric listening songs Somebody's Me and Hero.
response.title: Enrique Iglesias: Live from Odyssey Arena, in Belfast UK
